---
devices:
  - name: Synth A
  - port: 1
  - channel: 1
  - name: Synth B
  - port: 1
  - channel: 2
---

# Multi-Device Test

## Controls

| Control (Dec) | Label | Range | Choices | Color |
|---------------|-------|-------|---------|-------|
| 1:10 | Device 1 Filter | 0-127 |  | #FF0000 |
| 2:10 | Device 2 Filter | 0-127 |  | #00FF00 |
| 1:20 | Device 1 Resonance | 0-127 |  | #FF0000 |
| 2:20 | Device 2 Resonance | 0-127 |  | #00FF00 |
